name: WelcomeUser!
author: Chris Carvache

sections.description:
WelcomeUser! make it possible to add customizable welcome messages to you users based on their user roles. Inspired by sites such as eBay and Amazon, use this handy plugin for things such as:

  • Providing a set of quick links for your users
  • Displaying a friendly welcome message
  • Creating a call-to-action based on user role
sections.installation:
Quick and painless!

  1. Upload the /welcomeuser/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure via the Settings -> WelcomeUser! menu
  4. Place <?php nlws_wu(); ?> in your template somewhere or add [nlws_wu] shortcode in a page or widget.
sections.faq:
Why does this plugin exist?

Necessity is the mother of all invention.

short_description: Add commonly seen user login links and welcome messages to the meta / utility section of your blog.
